title: Establish Cybersecurity News Review Protocol
objective: To create and implement a structured protocol for the regular submission and review of cybersecurity-related news and articles, enhancing the organization's ability to stay informed about potential threats and vulnerabilities.
kpis: Number of articles submitted per month
Feedback from stakeholders on relevance and quality of information
Reduction in response time to identified threats
risks: Low participation from team members in submissions
Inaccurate or biased information being reviewed
Overwhelming volume of articles leading to analysis paralysis
Lack of ongoing engagement and follow-up on identified threats
